hero.title: Bright Futures Preschool
hero.subtitle: Montessori-based International Preschool in Vake, Tbilisi
hero.description: A warm, academic, play-based preschool for children aged 18 months to 6 years.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Where Every Child Shines
about.description: Bright Futures Preschool has been operating since August 1, 2015. We create a warm, supportive atmosphere where children develop independence, cognitive skills, and social abilities through Montessori and High/Scope pedagogies.
highlights: Focus on independence and cognitive development

curriculum.title: Our Curriculum
curriculum.subtitle: Learn Through Play and Discovery
curriculum.description: We combine Montessori methods with High/Scope pedagogy to create a rich learning environment.

items.title: Montessori Approach
items.description: Self-directed activities with hands-on materials that foster independence and natural curiosity.

items.title: High/Scope Method
items.description: Active learning through planning, doing, and reflecting on experiences.

items.title: Academic Foundation
items.description: Pre-math, alphabet, colors, shapes, and early literacy skills.

items.title: Social Development
items.description: Building social skills, empathy, and cooperation through group activities.

items.title: Motor Skills
items.description: Fine and gross motor development through purposeful activities and play.

items.title: Independence
items.description: Encouraging self-sufficiency and confidence in daily routines.

routine.title: Daily Routine
routine.subtitle: A Structured Day Full of Discovery

items.name: Art
items.description: Creative expression through various art mediums

items.name: Pottery
items.description: Hands-on clay work developing fine motor skills

items.name: Science
items.description: Exploring the natural world through experiments

fieldTrips.title: Field Trips
fieldTrips.subtitle: Learning Beyond Our Walls
fieldTrips.description: We organize regular educational excursions to museums, zoos, fire stations, and other venues to expand children's understanding of their community, professions, and culture.

events.title: Special Events
events.subtitle: Celebrating Together
events.description: We host numerous family-friendly events throughout the year, creating memorable experiences and building our community.

staff.name: Naniko Machaidze
staff.experience: Over 10 years in early childhood education

montessori.title: Montessori Philosophy
montessori.subtitle: Child-Centered Learning
montessori.description: We follow AMI (Association Montessori Internationale) principles, emphasizing self-directed activity, hands-on learning with specially designed materials, and respect for each child's natural development.

doodleTown.title: Doodle Town Program
doodleTown.subtitle: English Learning Through Play
doodleTown.description: We are proud to be the first preschool in Georgia to implement the Doodle Town English learning program. This innovative curriculum uses music, movement, creative activities, and TPR (Total Physical Response) methods to create an immersive English-rich environment.
benefits: TPR activities for natural language acquisition
Develops speech, motor skills, and critical thinking
